content.stimulus_en: I (send) ________ you an email tonight.
(will) ________ you lend me some money?
Don't worry, I (not/forget) ________.
I (promise) ________ I won't tell anyone.
I (help) ________ you with those bags.
I (call) ________ you as soon as I arrive.
Wait, I'll open the door for you.
I'll you send the photos as soon as possible.
I won't tell your secret to anyone.
I'll you lend my umbrella if it rains.
I promise I'll be home before midnight.
Will help you me with my homework, please?
A future or related word for Promesa/Prometer is '________'.
Help
